transcript.name: t1
transcript.comment: This transcript is identical to the RefSeq transcript NM_000509.5 but with the polyA tail removed.
The coding sequence of this transcript is identical to the coding sequence of Ensembl transcript ENST00000404648.7. The two transcripts differ at the 5'UTR.

transcript.name: t2
transcript.comment: This transcript is identical to the RefSeq transcript NM_021870.2 but with the polyA tail removed.
The coding sequence of this transcript is identical to the coding sequence of Ensembl transcript ENST00000336098.7. The two transcripts differ at the 5'UTR.

contact.name: Ilenia Simeoni
contact.address: University of Cambridge Department of Haematology & NHS Blood and Transplant

transcript.long_name: fibrinogen gamma chain, transcript variant gamma
fibrinogen gamma chain, transcript variant gamma-B

annotation_set.comment: Annotation is based on Ensembl release 92 (GRCh38 primary assembly)
